Without a doubt a 10/10 Game. 

Geometry Dash is one of those rare games that hooks you instantly and keeps you coming back for "just one more try." It combines fast-paced platforming with an energetic soundtrack to create a highly addictive, rewarding experience.

At its core, the gameplay is simple: tap to jump and avoid obstacles. But what makes Geometry Dash shine is how it turns that simplicity into something thrilling. Every level is synced to music, so your movements feel like they’re part of the beat. The better you get, the more it feels like you’re playing the music, not just reacting to it. 

The visuals are bright, clean, and stylish, and each level has its own vibe.

If you enjoy rhythm games, satisfying challenge, or creative level design, Geometry Dash is a must-play. It’s fun, fast, and full of energy — a modern classic that truly earns its fanbase.

I LOVE this game. It's only $5, it's got a whole bunch of content, and you can build your own levels. If you get the Geode hack by Googling up "geode", going to the official Geode website (it should be the first page) and downloading the EXE file, then you can install hacks for the game such as speedhacks (which slows your game down so you can process each click) and noclip (which basically means you can't crash into anything). But I have been playing this game for almost a year and I really like it (again). I would recommend this game. I really like the fact you can build your own levels (if you get the game check out my level Death Moon Rebirth 2 on my account, BloomyMania). The only thing I don't like about the game is that there are incredibly long download times for the songs, but thanks to Speed Hack, that's taken care of.
This game is amazing! There's so much to do and explore! I really recommend this gam!
